trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ModifyDNRequest" /> class modifies the distinguished name of an object.
trans-unit.target: La classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ModifyDNRequest" /> modifica il nome distinto di un oggetto.

trans-unit.source: This class moves an object to a new parent and/or renames the object.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe sposta un oggetto in un nuovo elemento padre e/o rinomina l'oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ModifyDNRequest.#ctor" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ModifyDNRequest" /> object.
The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ModifyDNRequest.#ctor" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ModifyDNRequest" /> object.
The current distinguished name of the object.
The distinguished name of the new parent of the object.
trans-unit.target: Nome distinto del nuovo elemento padre dell'oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The new distinguished name of the object.

The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ModifyDNRequest.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String)" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ModifyDNRequest" /> object using the specified object name, parent name, and new object name.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ModifyDNRequest.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String)" /> crea un'istanza dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ModifyDNRequest" /> utilizzando il nome dell'oggetto, il nome dell'elemento padre e il nuovo nome dell'oggetto specificati.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ModifyDNRequest.DeleteOldRdn" /> property specifies whether to delete the old relative distinguished name (RDN) of the object.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ModifyDNRequest.DeleteOldRdn" /> specifica se il precedente nome distinto relativo (RDN) dell'oggetto deve essere eliminato.

trans-unit.source: This property is <see langword="true" /> if the RDN should be deleted or <see langword="false" /> if it should not be deleted.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà è <see langword="true" /> se il nome distinto relativo deve essere eliminato; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ModifyDNRequest.DistinguishedName" /> property contains the distinguished name of the object.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ModifyDNRequest.DistinguishedName" /> contiene il nome distinto dell'oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The distinguished name of the object.
The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ModifyDNRequest.NewName" /> property contains the new object name.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ModifyDNRequest.NewName" /> contiene il nuovo nome dell'oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ModifyDNRequest.NewParentDistinguishedName" /> property contains the distinguished name of the new parent of the object.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ModifyDNRequest.NewParentDistinguishedName" /> contiene il nome distinto del nuovo elemento padre dell'oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The distinguished name of the new parent of the object.
trans-unit.target: Nome distinto del nuovo elemento padre dell'oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ModifyDNRequest.ToXmlNode(System.Xml.XmlDocument)" /> method creates an XML node from the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDocument" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ModifyDNRequest.ToXmlNode(System.Xml.XmlDocument)" /> crea un nodo XML dall'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDocument" /> specificato.
